  69. ‌CAMLexport char * caml_strerror(int errnum, char * buf, size_t buflen)
  70. {
  71. #ifdef _WIN32
  72.   /* Windows has a thread-safe strerror */
  73.   return strerror(errnum);
  74. #else
  75.   int res = strerror_r(errnum, buf, buflen);
  76.   /* glibc<2.13 returns -1/sets errno, >2.13 returns +ve errno.
  77.      We assume that buffer size is large enough not to get ERANGE,
  78.      so we assume we got EINVAL. */
  79.   if (res != 0) {
  80.     snprintf(buf, buflen, "Unknown error %d", errnum);
  81.   }
  82.   return buf;
  83. #endif
  84. }

  86. #ifndef EAGAIN
  87. ‌#define EAGAIN (-1)
  88. #endif
  89. #ifndef EWOULDBLOCK
  90. ‌#define EWOULDBLOCK (-1)
  91. #endif

  93. ‌CAMLexport void caml_sys_error(value arg)
  94. {
  95.   CAMLparam1 (arg);
  96.   char * err;
  97.   char buf[1024];
  98.   CAMLlocal1 (str);

  100.   err = caml_strerror(errno, buf, sizeof(buf));
  101.   if (arg == NO_ARG) {
  102.     str = caml_copy_string(err);
  103.   } else {
  104.     mlsize_t err_len = strlen(err);
  105.     mlsize_t arg_len = caml_string_length(arg);
  106.     str = caml_alloc_string(arg_len + 2 + err_len);
  107.     memcpy(&Byte(str, 0), String_val(arg), arg_len);
  108.     memcpy(&Byte(str, arg_len), ": ", 2);
  109.     memcpy(&Byte(str, arg_len + 2), err, err_len);
  110.   }
  111.   caml_raise_sys_error(str);
  112.   CAMLnoreturn;
  113. }

  115. ‌CAMLexport void caml_sys_io_error(value arg)
  116. {
  117.   if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
  118.     caml_raise_sys_blocked_io();
  119.   } else {
  120.     caml_sys_error(arg);
  121.   }
  122. }

  124. /* Check that [name] can safely be used as a file path */

  126. ‌static void caml_sys_check_path(value name)
  127. {
  128.   if (! caml_string_is_c_safe(name)) {
  129.     errno = ENOENT;
  130.     caml_sys_error(name);
  131.   }
  132. }

  134. ‌CAMLexport void caml_do_exit(int retcode)
  135. {
  136.   caml_domain_state* domain_state = Caml_state;
  137.   struct gc_stats s;

  139.   if ((atomic_load_relaxed(&caml_verb_gc) & 0x400) != 0) {
  140.     caml_compute_gc_stats(&s);
  141.     {
  142.       /* cf caml_gc_counters */
  143.       double minwords = s.alloc_stats.minor_words
  144.         + (double) (domain_state->young_end - domain_state->young_ptr);
  145.       double majwords = s.alloc_stats.major_words
  146.         + (double) domain_state->allocated_words;
  147.       double allocated_words = minwords + majwords
  148.         - s.alloc_stats.promoted_words;
  149.       intnat heap_words =
  150.         s.heap_stats.pool_words + s.heap_stats.large_words;
  151.       intnat top_heap_words =
  152.         s.heap_stats.pool_max_words + s.heap_stats.large_max_words;

  154.       if (heap_words == 0) {
  155.         heap_words = Wsize_bsize(caml_heap_size(Caml_state->shared_heap));
  156.       }

  158.       if (top_heap_words == 0) {
  159.         top_heap_words = caml_top_heap_words(Caml_state->shared_heap);
  160.       }

  162.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "allocated_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  163.                     (intnat)allocated_words);
  164.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "minor_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  165.                     (intnat) minwords);
  166.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "promoted_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  167.                       (intnat) s.alloc_stats.promoted_words);
  168.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "major_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  169.                       (intnat) majwords);
  170.       caml_gc_message(0x400,
  171.           "minor_collections: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  172.           (intnat) atomic_load(&caml_minor_collections_count));
  173.       caml_gc_message(0x400,
  174.           "major_collections: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  175.           caml_major_cycles_completed);
  176.       caml_gc_message(0x400,
  177.           "forced_major_collections: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  178.           (intnat)s.alloc_stats.forced_major_collections);
  179.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "heap_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  180.                     heap_words);
  181.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "top_heap_words: %"ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT"d\n",
  182.                       top_heap_words);
  183.       caml_gc_message(0x400, "mean_space_overhead: %lf\n",
  184.                       caml_mean_space_overhead());
  185.     }
  186.   }

  188. /* Tear down runtime_events before we leave */
  189. CAML_RUNTIME_EVENTS_DESTROY();

  191. #ifndef NATIVE_CODE
  192.   caml_debugger(PROGRAM_EXIT, Val_unit);
  193. #endif
  194.   if (caml_params->cleanup_on_exit)
  195.     caml_shutdown();
  196. #ifdef _WIN32
  197.   caml_restore_win32_terminal();
  198. #endif
  199.   caml_terminate_signals();
  200.   exit(retcode);
  201. }

  203. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_exit(value retcode)
  204. {
  205.   caml_do_exit(Int_val(retcode));
  206. }

  208. #ifndef O_BINARY
  209. ‌#define O_BINARY 0
  210. #endif
  211. #ifndef O_TEXT
  212. ‌#define O_TEXT 0
  213. #endif
  214. #ifndef O_NONBLOCK
  215. #ifdef O_NDELAY
  216. ‌#define O_NONBLOCK O_NDELAY
  217. #else
  218. ‌#define O_NONBLOCK 0
  219. #endif
  220. #endif

  222. ‌const static int sys_open_flags[] = {
  223.   O_RDONLY, O_WRONLY, O_APPEND | O_WRONLY, O_CREAT, O_TRUNC, O_EXCL,
  224.   O_BINARY, O_TEXT, O_NONBLOCK
  225. };

  227. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_open(value path, value vflags, value vperm)
  228. {
  229.   CAMLparam3(path, vflags, vperm);
  230.   int fd, flags, perm;
  231.   char_os * p;

  233. #if defined(O_CLOEXEC)
  234.   flags = O_CLOEXEC;
  235. #elif defined(_WIN32)
  236.   flags = _O_NOINHERIT;
  237. #else
  238.   flags = 0;
  239. #endif

  241.   caml_sys_check_path(path);
  242.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(path));
  243.   flags |= caml_convert_flag_list(vflags, sys_open_flags);
  244.   perm = Int_val(vperm);
  245.   /* open on a named FIFO can block (PR#8005) */
  246.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  247.   fd = open_os(p, flags, perm);
  248.   /* fcntl on a fd can block (PR#5069)*/
  249. #if defined(F_SETFD) && defined(FD_CLOEXEC) && !defined(_WIN32) \
  250.   && !defined(O_CLOEXEC)
  251.   if (fd != -1)
  252.     fcntl(fd, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
  253. #endif
  254.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  255.   caml_stat_free(p);
  256.   if (fd == -1) caml_sys_error(path);
  257.   CAMLreturn(Val_long(fd));
  258. }

  260. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_close(value fd_v)
  261. {
  262.   int fd = Int_val(fd_v);
  263.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  264.   close(fd);
  265.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  266.   return Val_unit;
  267. }

  269. ‌static int caml_sys_file_mode(value name)
  270. {
  271. #ifdef _WIN32
  272.   struct _stati64 st;
  273. #else
  274.   struct stat st;
  275. #endif
  276.   char_os * p;
  277.   int ret;

  279.   if (! caml_string_is_c_safe(name)) { errno = ENOENT; return -1; }
  280.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(name));
  281.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  282.   ret = stat_os(p, &st);
  283.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  284.   caml_stat_free(p);
  285.   if (ret == -1) return -1; else return st.st_mode;
  286. }

  288. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_file_exists(value name)
  289. {
  290.   int mode = caml_sys_file_mode(name);
  291.   return (Val_bool(mode != -1));
  292. }

  294. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_is_directory(value name)
  295. {
  296.   CAMLparam1(name);
  297.   int mode = caml_sys_file_mode(name);
  298.   if (mode == -1) caml_sys_error(name);
  299. #ifdef S_ISDIR
  300.   CAMLreturn(Val_bool(S_ISDIR(mode)));
  301. #else
  302.   CAMLreturn(Val_bool(mode & S_IFDIR));
  303. #endif
  304. }

  306. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_is_regular_file(value name)
  307. {
  308.   CAMLparam1(name);
  309.   int mode = caml_sys_file_mode(name);
  310.   if (mode == -1) caml_sys_error(name);
  311. #ifdef S_ISREG
  312.   CAMLreturn(Val_bool(S_ISREG(mode)));
  313. #else
  314.   CAMLreturn(Val_bool(mode & S_IFREG));
  315. #endif
  316. }

  318. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_remove(value name)
  319. {
  320.   CAMLparam1(name);
  321.   char_os * p;
  322.   int ret;
  323.   caml_sys_check_path(name);
  324.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(name));
  325.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  326.   ret = caml_unlink(p);
  327.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  328.   caml_stat_free(p);
  329.   if (ret != 0) caml_sys_error(name);
  330.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  331. }

  333. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_rename(value oldname, value newname)
  334. {
  335.   char_os * p_old;
  336.   char_os * p_new;
  337.   int ret;
  338.   caml_sys_check_path(oldname);
  339.   caml_sys_check_path(newname);
  340.   p_old = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(oldname));
  341.   p_new = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(newname));
  342.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  343.   ret = rename_os(p_old, p_new);
  344.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  345.   caml_stat_free(p_new);
  346.   caml_stat_free(p_old);
  347.   if (ret != 0)
  348.     caml_sys_error(NO_ARG);
  349.   return Val_unit;
  350. }

  352. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_chdir(value dirname)
  353. {
  354.   CAMLparam1(dirname);
  355.   char_os * p;
  356.   int ret;
  357.   caml_sys_check_path(dirname);
  358.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(dirname));
  359.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  360.   ret = chdir_os(p);
  361.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  362.   caml_stat_free(p);
  363.   if (ret != 0) caml_sys_error(dirname);
  364.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  365. }

  367. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_mkdir(value path, value perm)
  368. {
  369.   CAMLparam2(path, perm);
  370.   char_os * p;
  371.   int ret;
  372.   caml_sys_check_path(path);
  373.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(path));
  374.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  375.   ret = mkdir_os(p, Int_val(perm));
  376.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  377.   caml_stat_free(p);
  378.   if (ret == -1) caml_sys_error(path);
  379.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  380. }

  382. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_rmdir(value path)
  383. {
  384.   CAMLparam1(path);
  385.   char_os * p;
  386.   int ret;
  387.   caml_sys_check_path(path);
  388.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(path));
  389.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  390.   ret = rmdir_os(p);
  391.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  392.   caml_stat_free(p);
  393.   if (ret == -1) caml_sys_error(path);
  394.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  395. }

  397. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_getcwd(value unit)
  398. {
  399.   char_os buff[4096];
  400.   char_os * ret;
  401. #ifdef HAS_GETCWD
  402.   ret = getcwd_os(buff, sizeof(buff)/sizeof(*buff));
  403. #else
  404.   caml_invalid_argument("Sys.getcwd not implemented");
  405. #endif /* HAS_GETCWD */
  406.   if (ret == 0) caml_sys_error(NO_ARG);
  407.   return caml_copy_string_of_os(buff);
  408. }

  410. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_unsafe_getenv(value var)
  411. {
  412.   char_os * res, * p;
  413.   value val;

  415.   if (! caml_string_is_c_safe(var)) caml_raise_not_found();
  416.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(var));
  417. #ifdef _WIN32
  418.   res = caml_win32_getenv(p);
  419. #else
  420.   res = getenv(p);
  421. #endif
  422.   caml_stat_free(p);
  423.   if (res == 0) caml_raise_not_found();
  424.   val = caml_copy_string_of_os(res);
  425. #ifdef _WIN32
  426.   caml_stat_free(res);
  427. #endif
  428.   return val;
  429. }

  431. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_getenv(value var)
  432. {
  433.   char_os * res, * p;
  434.   value val;

  436.   if (! caml_string_is_c_safe(var)) caml_raise_not_found();
  437.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(var));
  438. #ifdef _WIN32
  439.   res = caml_win32_getenv(p);
  440. #else
  441.   res = caml_secure_getenv(p);
  442. #endif
  443.   caml_stat_free(p);
  444.   if (res == 0) caml_raise_not_found();
  445.   val = caml_copy_string_of_os(res);
  446. #ifdef _WIN32
  447.   caml_stat_free(res);
  448. #endif
  449.   return val;
  450. }

  452. ‌static value main_argv;

  454. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_get_argv(value unit)
  455. {
  456.   CAMLparam0 ();   /* unit is unused */
  457.   CAMLlocal2 (exe_name, res);
  458.   exe_name = caml_copy_string_of_os(caml_params->exe_name);
  459.   res = caml_alloc_small(2, 0);
  460.   Field(res, 0) = exe_name;
  461.   Field(res, 1) = main_argv;
  462.   CAMLreturn(res);
  463. }

  465. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_argv(value unit)
  466. {
  467.   return main_argv;
  468. }

  470. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_modify_argv(value new_argv)
  471. {
  472.   caml_modify_generational_global_root(&main_argv, new_argv);
  473.   return Val_unit;
  474. }

  476. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_executable_name(value unit)
  477. {
  478.   return caml_copy_string_of_os(caml_params->exe_name);
  479. }

  481. ‌void caml_sys_init(char_os * exe_name, char_os **argv)
  482. {
  483. #ifdef _WIN32
  484.   /* Initialises the caml_win32_* globals on Windows with the version of
  485.      Windows which is running */
  486.   caml_probe_win32_version();
  487. #if WINDOWS_UNICODE
  488.   caml_setup_win32_terminal();
  489. #endif
  490. #endif
  491.   caml_init_exe_name(exe_name);
  492.   main_argv = caml_alloc_array((void *)caml_copy_string_of_os,
  493.                                (char const **) argv);
  494.   caml_register_generational_global_root(&main_argv);
  495. }

  497. #ifdef _WIN32
  498. ‌#define WIFEXITED(status) 1
  499. ‌#define WEXITSTATUS(status) (status)
  500. #else
  501. #if !(defined(WIFEXITED) && defined(WEXITSTATUS))
  502. /* Assume old-style V7 status word */
  503. ‌#define WIFEXITED(status) (((status) & 0xFF) == 0)
  504. ‌#define WEXITSTATUS(status) (((status) >> 8) & 0xFF)
  505. #endif
  506. #endif

  508. #ifdef HAS_SYSTEM
  509. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_system_command(value command)
  510. {
  511.   CAMLparam1 (command);
  512.   int status, retcode;
  513.   char_os *buf;

  515.   if (! caml_string_is_c_safe (command)) {
  516.     errno = EINVAL;
  517.     caml_sys_error(command);
  518.   }
  519.   buf = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(command));
  520.   caml_enter_blocking_section ();
  521.   status = system_os(buf);
  522.   caml_leave_blocking_section ();
  523.   caml_stat_free(buf);
  524.   if (status == -1) caml_sys_error(command);
  525.   if (WIFEXITED(status))
  526.     retcode = WEXITSTATUS(status);
  527.   else
  528.     retcode = 255;
  529.   CAMLreturn (Val_int(retcode));
  530. }
  531. #else
  532. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_system_command(value command)
  533. {
  534.   caml_invalid_argument("Sys.command not implemented");
  535. }
  536. #endif

  538. ‌double caml_sys_time_include_children_unboxed(value include_children)
  539. {
  540. #ifdef HAS_GETRUSAGE
  541.   struct rusage ru;
  542.   double acc = 0.;

  544.   getrusage (RUSAGE_SELF, &ru);
  545.   acc += ru.ru_utime.tv_sec + ru.ru_utime.tv_usec / 1e6
  546.     + ru.ru_stime.tv_sec + ru.ru_stime.tv_usec / 1e6;

  548.   if (Bool_val(include_children)) {
  549.     getrusage (RUSAGE_CHILDREN, &ru);
  550.     acc += ru.ru_utime.tv_sec + ru.ru_utime.tv_usec / 1e6
  551.       + ru.ru_stime.tv_sec + ru.ru_stime.tv_usec / 1e6;
  552.   }

  554.   return acc;
  555. #else
  556.   #ifdef HAS_TIMES
  557.     #ifndef CLK_TCK
  558.       #ifdef HZ
  559.         #define CLK_TCK HZ
  560.       #else
  561.         #define CLK_TCK 60
  562.       #endif
  563.     #endif
  564.     struct tms t;
  565.     clock_t acc = 0;
  566.     times(&t);
  567.     acc += t.tms_utime + t.tms_stime;
  568.     if (Bool_val(include_children)) {
  569.       acc += t.tms_cutime + t.tms_cstime;
  570.     }
  571.     return (double)acc / CLK_TCK;
  572.   #else
  573.     /* clock() is standard ANSI C. We have no way of getting
  574.        subprocess times in this branch. */
  575.     return (double)clock_os() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
  576.   #endif
  577. #endif
  578. }

  580. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_time_include_children(value include_children)
  581. {
  582.   return caml_copy_double(
  583.       caml_sys_time_include_children_unboxed(include_children));
  584. }

  586. ‌double caml_sys_time_unboxed(value unit) {
  587.   return caml_sys_time_include_children_unboxed(Val_false);
  588. }

  590. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_time(value unit)
  591. {
  592.   return caml_copy_double(caml_sys_time_unboxed(unit));
  593. }

  595. #ifdef _WIN32
  596. extern int caml_win32_random_seed (intnat data[16]);
  597. #else
  598. ‌int caml_unix_random_seed(intnat data[16])
  599. {
  600.   int n = 0;
  601.   unsigned char buffer[12];
  602.   int nread = 0;

  604.   /* Try kernel entropy first */
  605. #if defined(HAS_GETENTROPY) || defined(__APPLE__)
  606.   if (getentropy(buffer, 12) != -1) {
  607.     nread = 12;
  608.   } else
  609. #endif
  610.   { int fd = open("/dev/urandom", O_RDONLY, 0);
  611.     if (fd != -1) {
  612.       nread = read(fd, buffer, 12);
  613.       close(fd);
  614.     }
  615.   }
  616.   while (nread > 0) data[n++] = buffer[--nread];
  617.   /* If the kernel provided enough entropy, we now have 96 bits
  618.      of good random data and can stop here. */
  619.   if (n >= 12) return n;

  621.   /* Otherwise, complement whatever we got (probably nothing)
  622.      with some not-very-random data. */
  623.   {
  624. #ifdef HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
  625.     struct timeval tv;
  626.     gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
  627.     if (n < 16) data[n++] = tv.tv_usec;
  628.     if (n < 16) data[n++] = tv.tv_sec;
  629. #else
  630.     if (n < 16) data[n++] = time(NULL);
  631. #endif
  632. #ifdef HAS_UNISTD
  633.     if (n < 16) data[n++] = getpid();
  634.     if (n < 16) data[n++] = getppid();
  635. #endif
  636.     return n;
  637.   }
  638. }
  639. #endif

  641. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_random_seed (value unit)
  642. {
  643.   intnat data[16];
  644.   int n, i;
  645.   value res;
  646. #ifdef _WIN32
  647.   n = caml_win32_random_seed(data);
  648. #else
  649.   n = caml_unix_random_seed(data);
  650. #endif
  651.   /* Convert to an OCaml array of ints */
  652.   res = caml_alloc_small(n, 0);
  653.   for (i = 0; i < n; i++) Field(res, i) = Val_long(data[i]);
  654.   return res;
  655. }

  657. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_big_endian(value unit)
  658. {
  659. #ifdef ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN
  660.   return Val_true;
  661. #else
  662.   return Val_false;
  663. #endif
  664. }

  666. /* returns a value that represents a number of bits */
  667. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_word_size(value unit)
  668. {
  669.   return Val_long(8 * sizeof(value));
  670. }

  672. /* returns a value that represents a number of bits */
  673. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_int_size(value unit)
  674. {
  675.   return Val_long(8 * sizeof(value) - 1) ;
  676. }

  678. /* returns a value that represents a number of words */
  679. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_max_wosize(value unit)
  680. {
  681.   return Val_long(Max_wosize) ;
  682. }

  684. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_ostype_unix(value unit)
  685. {
  686.   return Val_bool(0 == strcmp(OCAML_OS_TYPE,"Unix"));
  687. }

  689. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_ostype_win32(value unit)
  690. {
  691.   return Val_bool(0 == strcmp(OCAML_OS_TYPE,"Win32"));
  692. }

  694. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_ostype_cygwin(value unit)
  695. {
  696.   return Val_bool(0 == strcmp(OCAML_OS_TYPE,"Cygwin"));
  697. }

  699. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_const_backend_type(value unit)
  700. {
  701.   return Val_int(1); /* Bytecode backed */
  702. }
  703. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_get_config(value unit)
  704. {
  705.   CAMLparam0 ();   /* unit is unused */
  706.   CAMLlocal2 (result, ostype);

  708.   ostype = caml_copy_string(OCAML_OS_TYPE);
  709.   result = caml_alloc_small (3, 0);
  710.   Field(result, 0) = ostype;
  711.   Field(result, 1) = Val_long (8 * sizeof(value));
  712. #ifdef ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN
  713.   Field(result, 2) = Val_true;
  714. #else
  715.   Field(result, 2) = Val_false;
  716. #endif
  717.   CAMLreturn (result);
  718. }

  720. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_read_directory(value path)
  721. {
  722.   CAMLparam1(path);
  723.   CAMLlocal1(result);
  724.   struct ext_table tbl;
  725.   char_os * p;
  726.   int ret;

  728.   caml_sys_check_path(path);
  729.   caml_ext_table_init(&tbl, 50);
  730.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(path));
  731.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  732.   ret = caml_read_directory(p, &tbl);
  733.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  734.   caml_stat_free(p);
  735.   if (ret == -1){
  736.     caml_ext_table_free(&tbl, 1);
  737.     caml_sys_error(path);
  738.   }
  739.   caml_ext_table_add(&tbl, NULL);
  740.   result = caml_copy_string_array((char const **) tbl.contents);
  741.   caml_ext_table_free(&tbl, 1);
  742.   CAMLreturn(result);
  743. }

  745. /* Return true if the value is a filedescriptor (int) that is
  746. * (presumably) open on an interactive terminal */
  747. ‌CAMLprim value caml_sys_isatty(value chan)
  748. {
  749.   int fd;
  750.   value ret;

  752.   fd = (Channel(chan))->fd;
  753. #ifdef _WIN32
  754.   ret = Val_bool(caml_win32_isatty(fd));
  755. #else
  756.   ret = Val_bool(isatty(fd));
  757. #endif

  759.   return ret;
  760. }
